title: The Home Planet
creator_contributor_role: KCTS (Television station : Seattle, Wash.), production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Human ecology
description: Episode number 6 of Series "The Miracle Planet". The home planet is the final volume of "The miracle planet" series and looks at some of the major questions confronting the human race. With our population growing, the supply of our resources dwindling, our atmosphere threatened, and the spectre of malnutrition and starvation haunting more and more of the Earth's population, what are the prospects for the planet continuing to support human life?
related_objects: Series; S00959; The Miracle Planet; Active; 1989
